venue.address_2: For directions, see the "Details" section of this meetup
venue.name: MIT

item.description:
Attend the free meditation and breath session to learn some of the breathing techniques and the mission that is putting a smile on peoples' faces across the world. The session is open to all and will also give you a glimpse into the very popular Art of Living course.

20 million people worldwide in 152 countries have experienced the lasting benefits of these breathing techniques




Directions to the MIT meetup:
Go to main MIT entrance on 77 Mass Ave (near Memorial Drive) and walk straight down the hall (called the "infinite corridor"). After crossing the large lobby in building 10, you will see a staircase for building 4. Climb up the staircase to the second floor and the room will be on your right. (Room #4-231)
item.name: Open Meditation and Art of Living Introduction Session !!!
